description: Walking on the beach, Lucas is cruised by Chad Hunt (making his stunning film debut), a laid-back tattooed love dude with a house on the island. Hunt invites him to a party that afternoon. Lucas stops by but leaves too soon to take part in the six-man poolside orgy that follows, in which Hunt shares three bottoms with sexy Latin Enrico Vega and delectable black stud Michael Rock.
title: Fire Island Cruising Orgy
